mapper.insert:
insert into t_fee_reconcile (reconcile_id, reconcile_code, company_id, account_amount, operator_id, operator_name, create_time, cancel_ok, account_id, waybill_id, payee_type, payer_id, payer_name, group_id)
values (#{rec.reconcileId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RECONCILE_CODE('YS'),
RECONCILE_CODE('YF'),
#{rec.companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rec.accountAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rec.operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rec.operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{rec.cancelOk,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{rec.accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec.waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec.payeeType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{rec.payerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rec.payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rec.groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select:
select
from t_fee_reconcile
cancel_ok=1 and company_id =#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and payee_type = #{payeeType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
and create_time > concat(#{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'000000')
and create_time < concat(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'235959')
and payer_name like concat('%',#{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and reconcile_code like concat('%',#{reconcileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and group_id =#{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by create_time desc
